plot: The legend of the Lake Monster comes back to life as Nick and Hank investigate a mysterious sighting linked to a tourist's death at a local lake. Rosalee's past comes back to haunt her. Elsewhere, Capt. Renard continues to support a candidate for mayor. Meanwhile, Nick is shown the scope of the Wesen uprising as the secret government agency takes him into the heart of their Portland operations center.

Neighbouring sheriff Doug Parcell asks the Portland PD to help investigate the mysterious killing of tourists by a lake monster. It was Logan Cobb, actually hired by the feral beaver brothers Dunbar, without instructions to kill, but the additional tourism gain feeds bloodthirsty greed. Captain Sean Renard enters politics at a mayoral candidate's side, but Meisner shows Nick the impressive underground HQ of the top-secret government agency that recruited him and Juliette with stunning ways to control Wesen. Monroe and Rosalee are upset by the appearance of her annoying nemesis Elizabeth Eiger.—KGF Vissers
